hackathon-description-text: Our event is completely free—food, swag, and prizes included—and will take place on Saturday, February 18, 2017 at the

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Senior Global eCommerce Program Manager at Symantec
Founder and CEO at Love with Food

hackathon-eligibility: High school girls in the Bay Area are welcome to attend XXHacks. No experience is required, however, having prior programming experience will be helpful. There will be workshops for you to learn new skills and mentors throughout the hackathon to help you personally.
hackathon-rules: Rules will be announced at the time of the event.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Advancing Social and Civil Rights Grand Prize

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Electric Imp Developer Kits and Sketch Licenses
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Advancing Social and Civil Rights Runner-up

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=350 Ellis St, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
hackathon-location-address: 350 Ellis St, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
hackathon-description-header: XXHacks is a 12-hour hackathon for high school girls who will work collaboratively to design a website or mobile application that addresses a real world challenge.
